pr_title: [FLINK-16265][table][csv] CsvTableSourceFactoryBase should compare LogicalTypes instead of TableSchema

timeline.message: [FLINK-16265][table][csv] CsvTableSourceFactoryBase should compare LogicalTypes instead of TableSchema

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can have a small utility in the class to get the LogicalType List from TableSchema? Then we don't need the long method chain.
timeline.author: wuchong
